a.xlink:title: Prepare idling mode. We stop all acquisitions and stop scanning. In case of failure, a warning is issued and we proceed to the idle mode.
Idling mode, we wait for a new scan to be triggered, and update the idling value if needed.
Prepare a scan, we initialize the internal buffers and status variables.
Wait for the laser to reach its new central frequency.

Prepare a specific scan step. We first check if we have already run all requested steps, in which cas we go back to preparing idling. Otherwise, we initialize the instruments, and move the scanner to its first position.
Wait for the scanner to reach its first position. There is a time limit after which we give up to avoid getting stuck.
Actual data recording. We collect the available data. When all data have been collected, we go back to preparing a step.
Prepare idling mode. We stop all acquisitions and stop scanning. In case of failure, a warning is issued and we proceed to the idle mode.
Idling mode, we wait for a new scan to be triggered, and update the idling value if needed.
Prepare a scan, we initialize the internal buffers and status variables.
Wait for the laser to reach its new central frequency.

Prepare a specific scan step. We first check if we have already run all requested steps, in which cas we go back to preparing idling. Otherwise, we initialize the instruments, and move the scanner to its first position.
Wait for the scanner to reach its first position. There is a time limit after which we give up to avoid getting stuck.
Actual data recording. We collect the available data. When all data have been collected, we go back to preparing a step.
